definition: variant of 迴響|回响[hui2 xiang3]
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: The most insignificant transgression reverberated in the most ethereal worlds.
sentences.chinese: 最微不足道的罪行在最超越尘俗的天地里引起回响。

sentences.english: Was there any negative feedback on your sex scenes or for playing a lesbian?
sentences.chinese: 演拉拉或拍床戏，有没有得过任何负面的回响？

sentences.english: Varipowerful's voice echoed, as well as Anduin flinched slightly.
sentences.chinese: 瓦里安的声响回响着，让安度因些微畏缩了点。

sentences.english: The big ball echoes the faintest sounds.
sentences.chinese: 最微小的声音在这大厅里也会产生回响。

sentences.english: These cries of ferocious challenge rang against walls of silence .
sentences.chinese: 那恶狠狠的挑战声在寂静组成的屏壁之内回响。

sentences.english: Speaking of Chen Juan, in your mind what kind of response is singing?
sentences.chinese: 说起陈涓，在你的脑海中回响的是怎样的歌声？
远处传来“我愿意”的回响。

sentences.english: Your good advices were still ringing in my ear long after you said them.
sentences.chinese: 你的忠告久久地回响在我的耳边。

sentences.english: The sounds of gongs and drums echoed in the great hall.
sentences.chinese: 我们的声音在空谷中回响。

sentences.english: Can you sing with all the voices of the mountain?
sentences.chinese: 你能否籍大山的千重回响吟唱？

sentences.english: Our voices echoed in the empty valley.
sentences.chinese: 我们的声音在空谷中回响。

sentences.english: To those who do not know it will bring echoes of reality.
sentences.chinese: 对不熟悉的人来说，它是对现实的回响。

sentences.english: During the break, the sportsground rang with happy shouts.
sentences.chinese: 课间休息时，操场上回响着欢快的叫声。

sentences.english: The sound resonates through salty fluid that fills the hollow shell of the cochlea.
sentences.chinese: 此时，声音就在充满盐性液体的耳蜗道回响开来。

sentences.english: The man's screams subsided, but dry sobs echoed through the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 那男人的叫声低了下去，但抽噎声还在过道里回响。

sentences.english: The mountains echoed back the noise of the shot.
sentences.chinese: 从山那边传来了枪声的回响。

definition: to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
lit. so loud that even the deaf can hear (idiom); rousing even the apathetic
singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
loud sound, such as that of thunder or a bomb/to rumble/to roar
